description.value: You blend in with unnatural subtlety. When you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], increase the DC of the flat check to target you to @Check[type:flat|dc:6] if you're concealed or @Check[type:flat|dc:12] if you're hidden.
